meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.

meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.

meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.

meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.

meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jis laukia progos įrodyti save.

meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kai viskas pasidarė sunku, jis paliko šeimą.

meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mes švaistome laiką diskutuodami nereikšmingomis temomis.

meaning list.meaning: Sistema arba grupė, kuri veikia sklandžiai (idioma)

meaning list.sentence translation: Komanda dirba kaip sklandžiai veikianti sistema.

meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: Puikiai praleidome laiką atrakcionų parke.

meaning list.meaning: Būti labai išblyškusiam nuo baimės ar ligos (idioma)

meaning list.sentence translation: Miestuose vis dažniau dirbama su baltais apykaklėmis.

meaning list.meaning: Kažkas, kas kainuoja per daug, bet yra nenaudinga (idioma)

meaning list.sentence translation: Stadionas miestui pasirodė brangi, bet nenaudinga investicija.

meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jis šiek tiek melavo, kad neįžeistų jos jausmų.

meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bendrovė bandė nuslėpti skandalą.

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.

meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Ateisiu į jūsų vakarėlį su dideliu susidomėjimu!

meaning list.meaning: Prizas arba titulas, suteikiamas paskutiniam asmeniui (idioma)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jie gavo medinio šaukšto apdovanojimą už tai, kad buvo paskutiniai lygoje.

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ši nauja valymo priemonė puikiai veikia.

meaning list.meaning: Niekada nedaryčiau ir nebūčiau tokioje situacijoje (idioma)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Niekada nenešiočiau tos aprangos.

meaning list.meaning: Pakartotinai, metai iš metų, metų metus (idioma)
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jie kasmet aplanko tą patį paplūdimį.

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jis per daug bailys, kad susidurtų su savo viršininku.
